column1: NGR is from the 1950s record and is near a Waterworks near Leadbeaters reservoir. The gauge seems to have started life at the reservoir probably NGR SJ928729 (+/- 100m) and alt 608 ft, i.e. 400m SSE of NGR used. The gauge moved in 1940 but no details given, stated altitude is near the water works 100m E of NGR used. Therefore gauge could be 100m to 400m SE of the NGR used
Jan 1940 reading noted as being corrected for snow; left in this record
